div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1115 Olbia (mod. Parutino), 1946 Burial: late 3rd-early 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 28 AE. In one room in agora Olbia: 1 aes grave (as Burachkov, pl. 6) 4 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 10-11 [3] pl. 10, 13 [1]) 23 AE flans Disposition: Kiev Kharko, "Ol'viia," pp. 346-7, nos. 22-47 (in- exact, with omissions)
